query:
SELECT s.id, s.userId, u.name as userName, s.modo, s.tipoSimulacao, s.descricaoOferta, s.createdAt 
FROM simulations s 
LEFT JOIN users u ON s.userId = u.id 
WHERE s.id = 1170001;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 2jqMZP8uptaqoP6.root --database neJFcwibfa3kRchdhTVVes --execute SELECT s.id, s.userId, u.name as userName, s.modo, s.tipoSimulacao, s.descricaoOferta, s.createdAt 
FROM simulations s 
LEFT JOIN users u ON s.userId = u.id 
WHERE s.id = 1170001;
